main.title: TRADING ‚Ä¢ CONSULTING ‚Ä¢ FORWARDING OF GOODS
main.description: We started serving the FMCG sector as IMPERIAL Ltd, taking advantage of the experience of previous companies with our participation since 2014

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.one: is an actively developing export-import company that bases its activities on rich experience and strong traditions of international business.
aboutUs.two: We started our journey as a young, but professional and ambitious company working in the direction of export and import of goods for decades, which continues today, expanding in the field of international trade, brand consulting and marketing, as well as food production.
aboutUs.three: In 2022, we founded a company that aims to grow and meet the needs in this area with the growing demand for FMCG goods through (Everyday Goods) restructuring.
aboutUs.four: Our company is a member of the Chamber of Commerce and is accredited in the free economic zone through a partner company.
aboutUs.five: We are always happy to cooperate with you, our valuable business partners, providing reliable, high-quality and fast service in the field of international procurement of FMCG goods. We specialize in trading a wide range of products, which you can see in the export / import section, as well as get information on request.
aboutUs.six: In our FMCG branded products offer you can find products from such manufacturers as: Ferrero, Mars, Nestle, Mondelez, Unilever, P&G, Perfetti Van Melle, Jacobs, Nescafe, Lavazza, Wrigley, Haribo, Storck, Coca-Cola and other companies. There is also a direction of export and import of other goods and services.

importSupplier.title: Import for supplier
importSupplier.text: It is associated with two important aspects, customs clearance in the importing country and so-called parallel import

parallelImport.title: Parallel import
parallelImport.description: Parallel import is the import of original goods into a country without the permission of the intellectual property rights holder. Sellers do not need the manufacturer's permission, as after the first purchase, it can be sold anywhere without the rights holders' consent. Goods supplied in this way are acquired and sold legally, they have all the licenses, quality certificates, and undergo customs declaration.
parallelImport.listTitle: Our Company offers the following types of goods for parallel import

customs.title: Customs registration
customs.description: Customs registration of goods is a mandatory condition for crossing the border and involves paying VAT and duties to the state budget.

home.title: TRADING ‚Ä¢ CONSULTING ‚Ä¢ FORWARDING OF GOODS
home.description: IMPERIAL LiMITEd ≈ûiRKETi is an actively developing export-import company that bases its activities on rich experience and strong traditions of international business. We started our journey as a young, but professional and ambitious company working in the direction of export and import of goods for decades, which continues today, expanding in the field of international trade, brand consulting and marketing, as well as food production. In 2022, we founded a company that aims to grow and meet the needs in this area with the growing demand for FMCG goods through (Everyday Goods) restructuring. Our company is a member of the Chamber of Commerce and is accredited in the free economic zone through a partner company. We are always happy to cooperate with you, our valuable business partners, providing reliable, high-quality and fast service in the field of international procurement of FMCG goods. We specialize in trading a wide range of products, which you can see in the export / import section, as well as get information on request. In our FMCG branded products offer you can find products from such manufacturers as: Ferrero, Mars, Nestle, Mondelez, Unilever, P&G, Perfetti Van Melle, Jacobs, Nescafe, Lavazza, Wrigley, Haribo, Storck, Coca-Cola and other companies. There is also a direction of export and import of other goods and services.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: We provide consulting on optimization of logistics and customs clearance of goods passing through the territory of Turkey. We are familiar with all the important aspects : ‚úÖ import-export legislation of Turkey ‚úÖ features of customs clearance procedures ‚úÖ the needs of the Turkish and other markets ‚úÖ and the most popular export destinations to other countries. Our specialists will answer all your questions about the export-import operations of any goods from/to Turkey, and our Company is also ready to accompany the transactions you conclude to their final result.

nutyjoy.title: Price List for NutyJoy
nutyjoy.description: We present to you NutyJoy chocolate spread, an excellent alternative to Nutella. This spread uses sunflower and cottonseed oils instead of palm oil, which is harmful to health. The product is fully manufactured in Turkey, has a Russian-language label, and comes with a manufacturer's certificate.
